title: LF ADC/Support/Jungle
body:
Looking for Players that will be dedicated to the team and the role they apply for, have a WIDE champion pool. You dont have to be pro just willing to learn and grow together as a team. Bronze - Challenger accepted. Players must be able to communicate with the team and listen/make calls as needed. 

We are Looking for ADC/Support/Jungle

Form:
IGN + op.gg Link:
Current Rank:
Any competitive gaming Experience?:
Role:
Top 5 champions for Role:
Raidcall?:
6 month League related Goal:
Availability:

replies.body:
**IGN:**

Musica (I speak English I just like R.A.V.E. a lot)

**Age:**

23

**Communication:**

I have Skype, Vent, TeamSpeak, and Curse. (I may have more somewhere)

**Current Rank:**

None (gold 5 solo que season 4: went from bronze to gold in 90 games)

**Any competitive gaming Experience?:**

LOL in itself is competitive . . . I've had 3 teams each one end up with use getting placed and then they stopped playing

**Position Desired:**

Support main and Jungle as back up

**Top 5 champions for Role:**

_Support: _{{champion:412}}  > {{champion:37}}  > {{champion:89}} > {{champion:53}} > {{champion:25}} 

_Jungle: _ #splitPush {{champion:77}} > {{champion:106}} > {{champion:266}}  > {{champion:23}} 

**Availability:**

Except for Tuesdays and Thursdays (8 pm) I'm available after 4 pm PST.

**Time Zone:**

PST

**Favorite LCS Team (NA/EU, LCS/CS):**

SK

**What would you bring to the team?:**

4 years of experience and experimentation if i find a better way of doing things you'll know.

**What are you strengths/weaknesses:**

_strengths:_ calling situations(this includes success of ganks, baits, flow of game, and objectives)

_weaknesses:_ 4 mans, seriously how difficult is it to ping and ward,

**Any other information:**

I hate everyone equally

IGN + op.gg Link: 
                             Musica (NA)  http://www.lolskill.net/summoner/NA/Musica/summary
Current Rank: 
                       None (gold 5 solo que season 4: went from bronze to gold in 90 games)
Any competitive gaming Experience?: 
               LOL in itself is competitive . . . I've had 3 teams each one end up with use getting placed and then they stopped playing
Role: 
         Support main and, and Jungle as back up
Top 5 champions for Role: 
                                              Thresh > Sona > Leona > Blitz for support
                                              Udyr #splitPusher, Voli, and Aatrox for jungle
Raidcall?: 
                 don't have but I can get it, however I have Skype, Vent, TeamSpeak, Curse, and steam.
6 month League related Goal:
                            after I graduate in like 2 weeks I planed to spend a week reworking thresh, sona, and Leona. then getting replaced in gold and  getting to plat.
Availability:
                   except for Tuesdays and Thursdays (8 pm) I'm available after 4 pm PST.

IGN + op.gg Link: Regurgitated http://na.op.gg/summoner/userName=RegurgiTateD
Current Rank: Plat 5
Any competitive gaming Experience?: Did some teams last season got to plat 3 5s, team disbanded due to leaving members
Role: Support main
Top 5 champions for Role: Janna, Nami, Leona, Sona, Thresh
Raidcall?: Yes
6 month League related Goal: Get back to diamond 5 like season 4.
Availability: All nights after 7pm est

IGN + op.gg Link:   xXQuetipXx  http://na.op.gg/summoner/userName=xXQuetipXx
Current Rank: Plat 4
Any competitive gaming Experience?: A little, played fives with a couple teams although the last one that stuck together for a while was in early s4 :/ Most of the teams I was the shot caller for, back when I played top.
Role: ADC, new to the role used to main top so I'm still learning, can also support.
Top 5 champions for Role:  
ADC:  {{champion:96}} {{champion:104}} {{champion:15}} {{champion:67}} {{champion:51}} 
Support:   {{champion:89}} {{champion:111}} {{champion:412}} {{champion:40}} {{champion:43}}  
Raidcall?: Can get it. although I much prefer other voice chats
6 month League related Goal: High plat or diamond
Availability: EST 5-11 monday to friday. Weekends I have all the time in the world.

Availability: every night after 830pm

IGN + op.gg Link:  EsoEs  https://na.op.gg/summoner/userName=esoes
Current Rank:  B2
Any competitive gaming Experience?:  Have played on several ranked 5s teams, the highest Ive gotten was Gold back in s3 with a pretty solid group, the rest never really have gotten beyond a few practice games
Role:  Jungle
Top 5 champions for Role:  Seju / Grag / Cho'Gath / Nautilus / Vi / Fiddlesticks / Rex Sai / and lots of others
Raidcall?:  no but i can get it
6 month League related Goal:  Hit Gold ranked solo again
Availability:  most evenings EST

I really enjoy playing 5 mans, I've had a lot of experience doing it and I'm looking for a group that actually plays together more than a handful of games before moving on to other stuff.
